```python
        return [[1, 0], [0, 1]]
    if n == 1:
        return A
    if n % 2 == 0:
        half = matrix_power(A, n//2)
        return matrix_multiply(half, half)
    return matrix_multiply(A, matrix_power(A, n-1))

def fibonacci_matrix(n):
    if n <= 0:
        return 0
    A = [[1, 1], [1, 0]]
    result = matrix_power(A, n-1)
    return result[0][0]
```

```cpp
// H√†m c·ªông hai s·ªë l·ªõn d·∫°ng string
string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {
    string result;
    int carry = 0;
    int i = num1.length() - 1;
    int j = num2.length() - 1;
    
    while (i >= 0 || j >= 0 || carry > 0) {
        int sum = carry;
        if (i >= 0) sum += num1[i--] - '0';
        if (j >= 0) sum += num2[j--] - '0';
        
        carry = sum / 10;
        result = char(sum % 10 + '0') + result;
    }
    
    return result;
}
```
